caption.center: LEROY W. ARMSTRONG v. VIRGINIA D. ARMSTRONG.

opinion.posture: Motion of defendant to consolidate appeal in Armstrong v.Armstrong, C. A. No. 74-64, pending in Superior Court with the instant case for hearing on May 5, 1975 is denied. The defendant's motion to strike certain portions of plaintiff's appendix and brief is denied without prejudice to the right of defendant to raise the issue at the hearing on the merits.
opinion.attorneys:
James P. Flynn, for plaintiff.
Abedon, Stanzler, Biener, Skolnik Lipsey, Milton Stanzler, for defendant.
